short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a link to Hacker News to view replies to your comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replies for Hacker News tells you if any of your comments or links received new replies. It also collects all recent replies to your account on one convenient page.

It's easy to forget to check your replies on Hacker News. You can miss out on really great replies to your comment or whole conversations.

Replies for Hacker News is free to trial for 14 days. it does not require a subscription and contains no ads.

Purchasing full version of this extension also unlocks Replies for Hacker News for Firefox and Safari.
